entities.name: department of mysteries

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is leading the group through the Department of Mysteries.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a member of the group who is following Harry through the Department of Mysteries.

entities.name: hummingbird
entities.description: A hummingbird is mentioned as an object that is being observed by Ginny.
